author: Bee Wilson
title: What Explains Our Mania for Avocados?
text:
Do you like avocado, by any chance? Me too. I love it in a salad with a squeeze of lime or in guacamole with a rasp of onion. Few other ingredients taste at once so dreamily rich and so healthy. I love avocado sliced up with eggs in the morning, and I love it mashed on toast just about any time, like sweet green butter.
I have even taken to tossing cubes of cold avocado in hot spaghetti with capers and herbs, an idea that comes from vegetarian chef Anna Jones. Not so long ago, I would have thought that only a crazy person...
